scripts.start:doc: npm run clean:doc ; nx serve doc --dev
scripts.start:editor: npm run clean:editor ; nx serve editor --dev --verbose
scripts.start:io: npm run clean:io ; nx serve dot-io --dev
scripts.start:org: npm run clean:org ; nx serve org-home --dev
scripts.build:org: npm run clean:org ; nx build org-home --dev
scripts.build:io: npm run clean:io ; nx build dot-io --dev
scripts.build:doc: npm run clean:doc ; nx build doc --dev
scripts.build:io:prod: npm run clean:io && nx build dot-io
scripts.clean: npm run clean:editor && npm run clean:io && npm run clean:doc && npm run clean:org
scripts.save: npm run clean ; git commit -am'wip' && git push
scripts.copydoctoio: mkdir apps/dot-io/www/n ; mv apps/doc/www/build apps/dot-io/www/n/ ; mv apps/doc/www/assets apps/dot-io/www/n/
scripts.deploy:org: npm run build:org && firebase deploy --only hosting:symthink-org
scripts.deploy:editor: npm run build:editor && firebase deploy --only hosting:symthink-staging
scripts.deploy:editor:prod: npm run prebuild && npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting:symthink-app
scripts.deploy:io: npm run build:io && npm run build:doc && firebase deploy --only hosting:symthink-io
